title: Vivo X80 Pro specs leak days ahead of the official launch
content:
After launching its first foldable smartphone — the Vivo X Fold — in China late last month, Vivo is gearing up to launch the highly-anticipated Vivo X80 series. The company has already confirmed that it will unveil the new lineup in China on April 25, but it hasn’t revealed any details about the devices. Fortunately,

The post Vivo X80 Pro specs leak days ahead of the official launch appeared first on xda-developers.
